document_data.mainbody:
Rebecca was the cook and a server at the Mithrest Inn in the City of Coin, Athkatla, in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Rebecca was a human woman with sun-kissed bronze skin and blonde hair. She was a diligent worker and polite with the inns clientele.
While Pugney manned his exclusive inns bar and front desk, Rebecca lorded over its kitchens. Their inn was located in the grand market in Athkatlas Center District â€“ Waukeens Promenade in the .
